doc:
Berry Berenson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Berry_Berenson 0 Berinthia "Berry" Berenson-Perkins (April 14, 1948 – September 11, 2001) was an American photographer, actress, and model. Perkins, who was the wife of actor Anthony Perkins, died in the September 11 attacks as a passenger on American Airlines Flight 11. Berinthia_"_Berry_"_Berenson-Perkins ( April_14_,_1948 – September_11_,_2001 ) was an_American_photographer , actress , and model . Perkins , who was the_wife of actor_Anthony_Perkins , died in the_September_11_attacks as a_passenger on American_Airlines_Flight_11 .
